item.description:
If you love the game of croquet and love knocking balls through wickets, or would love to try playing but never have before... This is a pleasant way to spend a sunny afternoon. I'll make Sangria and some sort of nibbles. Yes, this will be weather dependent, since we'll be outside on the lawn.

for more information about the game try http://www.croquet.co...

group.name: The NorthEast Connecticut Friends Meetup Group

item.name: Croquet, Sangria and Nibbles @ Victoria's Place
